teacherRegistration.usernameStepDescript: Fill in the following forms to request an account. The approval process may take up to 24 hours.
teacherRegistration.validationUsernameRe: Your username may only contain characters and -
teacherRegistration.validationUsernameMi: Usernames must be at least 3 characters
teacherRegistration.validationUsernameMa: Usernames must be at most 20 characters
teacherRegistration.validationPasswordLe: Passwords must be at least six characters
teacherRegistration.validationPasswordNo: Your password may not be your username
teacherRegistration.personalStepDescript: Your individual responses will not be displayed publicly, and will be kept confidential and secure
teacherRegistration.nameStepDescription: Your name will not be displayed publicly, and will be kept confidential and secure
teacherRegistration.phoneStepDescription: Your phone number will not be displayed publicly, and will be kept confidential and secure
teacherRegistration.phoneConsent: Yes, the Scratch Team may call me to verify my Teacher Account if needed
teacherRegistration.validationPhoneConse: You must consent to verification of your Teacher Account
